Posts.EditableText: I went back to the main page on accident and it deleted everything, is there a way to get it back?? I've had this for a couple years and i finally remembered this website and went to go see it and accidentally clicked back and now everything is gone.
Posts.HTML: I went back to the main page on accident and it deleted everything, is there a way to get it back?? I've had this for a couple years and i finally remembered this website and went to go see it and accidentally clicked back and now everything is gone.

Posts.EditableText: Once you saved it an exited the editor, I don't think you can recover it. Unless you have some sort of backups running on your computer.
Posts.HTML: Once you saved it an exited the editor, I don't think you can recover it. Unless you have some sort of backups running on your computer.
